titles.title: Spirit of God Lift me Up

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I can surely see Your holiness
As I look around this place,
With my arms stretched out
To receive Your love,
I can see You on each face.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Spirit of God, lift me up,
Spirit of God, lift me up,
Fill me again with Your love,
sweet Spirit of God. (x2)
